scripts.wasm:no-simd: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals -C link-arg=--max-memory=4294967296" rustup run nightly wasm-pack build --target web
scripts.wasm:simd: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals,+simd128 -C link-arg=--max-memory=4294967296" rustup run nightly wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg-simd
